resources.string: Breaking the law is thrilling and fun! Unfortunately this often leads to punishment... But just for once this punishment is desired.

Our bunny is unhappy with all his riches and wants to get rid of his money. You can help him achieve this by committing crimes and letting a cop fine you. Try to lose all 100 gold coins before the time is up.

There are three acts of vandalism you can carry out: spray walls, smash windows and blow up cars. Not all objects are meant to be destroyed - try to find out which ones work. Be aware though, if you commit too many crimes, the entire police force will be after you!
Steer the bunny around town with the arrows at the bottom right corner of the screen. Use the x-button in the center to perform actions.
